sentences.english: The National Weather Service had predicted that the river would crest to about 19 feet above flood stage.
sentences.chinese: 國家氣象臺曾預報紅河將上漲到洪水位以上19英尺。

sentences.english: The warning is based on the latest 5-day weather forecasts.
sentences.chinese: 這項警報是以今後5天的天氣預報資料爲基礎的。

sentences.english: At last, the forcasting equation of the plant output was supplied.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了農作物產量的預測預報方程。

sentences.english: Seismic phase analysis and identification are the basis of earthquake prediction and speed report.
sentences.chinese: 震相識別與分析是地震預報與速報的基礎。

sentences.english: The flood forecasting division gives authorities 24-hour warning of monsoon flooding.
sentences.chinese: 洪水預報部門爲當局提供了24小時季風洪水預警。

sentences.english: Hurricane forecasters expect this year's hurricane season to be busier than average.
sentences.chinese: 氣象預報員預計今年的颶風季會比往常更加頻繁。

sentences.english: Is that what the weatherman says?
sentences.chinese: 這是那位天氣預報員說的嗎？

sentences.english: The Navy will use the machine principally for oceanographic modeling and weather forecasting.
sentences.chinese: 海軍將主要將該計算機用於海洋圖像建模和天氣預報。

sentences.english: A weather forecaster said it was not yet possible to predict what would happen on Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 有氣象預報員稱，目前尚無法預測聖誕當天的天氣。

sentences.english: The weather forecast said horrible weather was coming.
sentences.chinese: 天氣預報說可怕的天氣即將到來。

sentences.english: At last, the forcasting equation of the plant output wass…
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了農作物產量的預測預報方程。

sentences.english: According to the weather forecast, it is going to rain.
sentences.chinese: 根據兲芞預報，兲將丅雨。

sentences.english: The weatherman forecasts snow for tomorrow, so bring a warm jacket.
sentences.chinese: 天氣預報員預報明天有雪，所以帶件暖和的外套吧。

sentences.english: The weatherman forecasts snow for tomorrow, so bring a warm jacket.
sentences.chinese: 天氣預報員預報明天有雪，所以帶件暖和的外套吧。

sentences.english: It is shown that a realistic representation of the atmospheric boundary layer is of great importance to numerical marine environment forecasts.
sentences.chinese: 指出大氣邊界層的處理對海洋環境數值預報的重要性。

definition: to become cooler/to lower the temperature/cooling/(of interest, activity etc) to decline
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
